00012 EagleDbConsole* EagleDbConsole_New(void)
00013 {
00014     EagleDbConsole *console = (EagleDbConsole*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleDbConsole_New.1", sizeof(EagleDbConsole));
00015     if(NULL == console) {
00016         return NULL;
00017     }
00018     
00019     console->startTime = EagleUtils_GetAbsoluteTime();
00020     
00021     return console;
00022 }

00024 char* EagleDbConsole_GetLine(void)
00025 {
00026     char *line = EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleDbConsole_GetLine.1", 100);
00027 #ifndef CUNIT
00028     char *linep = line, *linen = NULL;
00029     size_t lenmax = 100, len = lenmax;
00030     int c;
00031     EagleBoolean eof = EagleFalse;
00032 #endif
00033     
00034     if(line == NULL) {
00035         return NULL;
00036     }
00037     
00038 #ifndef CUNIT
00039     while(1) {
00040         c = fgetc(stdin);
00041         if(c == EOF) {
00042             eof = EagleTrue;
00043             break;
00044         }
00045         
00046         if(--len == 0) {
00047             len = lenmax;
00048             linen = realloc(linep, lenmax *= 2);
00049             
00050             if(linen == NULL) {
00051                 EagleMemory_Free(linep);
00052                 return NULL;
00053             }
00054             line = linen + (line - linep);
00055             linep = linen;
00056         }
00057         
00058         if((*line++ = (char) c) == '\n') {
00059             break;
00060         }
00061     }
00062     *line = '\0';
00063     
00064     /* chomp */
00065     linep[strlen(linep) - 1] = '\0';
00066     
00067     /* if there is nothing left on the stream return NULL */
00068     if(EagleTrue == eof && strlen(linep) == 0) {
00069         return NULL;
00070     }
00071     
00072     return linep;
00073 #else
00074     EagleMemory_Free(line);
00075     return NULL;
00076 #endif
00077 }

00079 void EagleDbConsole_run(EagleDbConsole *console)
00080 {
00081 #ifndef CUNIT
00082     char *cmd = NULL;
00083     EagleDbInstance *db = EagleDbInstance_New(1000, 1 /* FIXME */);
00084     EagleLoggerEvent *error = NULL;
00085     EagleBoolean readStdin = EagleFalse;
00086     
00087     /* read stdin (this is for a file being redriected in) */
00088     while(NULL != (cmd = EagleDbConsole_GetLine())) {
00089         /* parse */
00090         error = NULL;
00091         EagleDbInstance_execute(db, cmd, &error);
00092         if(NULL != error) {
00093             printf("Error: %s\n\n", error->message);
00094         }
00095         
00096         EagleMemory_Free(cmd);
00097         readStdin = EagleTrue;
00098     }
00099     
00100     /* now read commands */
00101     if(EagleFalse == readStdin) {
00102         while(1) {
00103             /* get line */
00104             printf("eagle> ");
00105             cmd = EagleDbConsole_GetLine();
00106             
00107             /* broken input */
00108             if(NULL == cmd) {
00109                 printf("Error: Broken stdin.\n");
00110                 break;
00111             }
00112             
00113             /* check for quit */
00114             if(strcmp(cmd, "\\q") == 0) {
00115                 printf("Bye.\n");
00116                 EagleMemory_Free(cmd);
00117                 break;
00118             }
00119             
00120             /* parse */
00121             error = NULL;
00122             EagleDbInstance_execute(db, cmd, &error);
00123             if(NULL != error) {
00124                 printf("Error: %s\n\n", error->message);
00125             }
00126             
00127             EagleMemory_Free(cmd);
00128         }
00129     }
00130 #endif
00131 }

00133 void EagleDbConsole_Delete(EagleDbConsole *console)
00134 {
00135     if(NULL == console) {
00136         return;
00137     }
00138     
00139 #ifndef CUNIT
00140     /* make sure the log is closed cleanly */
00141     EagleLogger_Delete(EagleLogger_Get());
00142 #endif
00143     
00144     EagleMemory_Free(console);
00145 }
